ema pethsama osse dakwa athi karunu wanne jayalalitha prathikara labana sthanayata kisiwakutath yamata awasara nodima, jayalalithage gnyathinta aya balima sandaha shashikala idanodun bawa jayalalithage gnyathi diyaniyak wu amrutha pawasa thibima, jayalalithage maranaya sambandhayen pashchath marana parikshanayak sidu nowima, awamangalya katayuthu sidu karannaku wisin jayalalithage nikate sidukala embam salakunak daknata labena bawin aya dina gananakata pera miyagiyada yana sakaya emagin ismathu wima ha desambar 6 wana dina sawasa 5.30 ta aya miyagiya bawata pracharaya wuye kawara hethuwak nisada yannayi.
